show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Mickey Huff interviews Nolan Higdon regarding his recent series “Justice for Sale,”  a  Project Censored investigative... <!--more--> report on prison privatization. Then we hear highlights from a recent speech by former Black Panther Charlotte O’Neal, aka “Mama C.
”Nolan Higdon is a college history instructor in the San Francisco Bay area.
Charlotte O’Neal was a member of the Black Panther Party in Kansas City in the the 1960s.
Today she operates a school and community center in Tanzania.
